description: Respirator for thee provision of National Institute of Occupational Health and Safety (NIOSH) certified half-mask respirator designed to provide respiratory protection due to inhalation of particulate contaminants resulting primarily from explosive gunfire residue. Include oil and no-oil contaminants such as lead, asbestos, fentanyl, and lubricant mist. The respirator must permit wearing with and without a helmet, and must integrate seamlessly with in-service equipment.

**Government Tender Announcement: Lightweight Protective Respirator Mask**
====================================================================

**Tender Title**: Lightweight Protective Respirator Mask
-----------------------------------------------------

**Reference Number**: cb-802-25271345

**Amendment Number**: 9
**Solicitation Number**: W6399-24LO84/B

**Publication Date**: 2023-11-15
**Tender Closing Date**: 2024-04-23T14:00:00

**Amendment Date**: 2024-04-23
**Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-05-06
**Expected Contract End Date**: 2027-05-06

**Tender Status**: This tender is expired.

**UNSPSC Code**: 46180000 - Personal safety and protection
**Description**: This tender is for a lightweight protective respirator mask designed to provide respiratory protection against particulate contaminants resulting from explosive gunfire residue.

**Procurement Category**: Goods and services
**Procurement Method**: Competitive bidding
**Selection Criteria**: The tender will be awarded based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Trade Agreements**: This tender is subject to the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and other applicable trade agreements.

**Regions of Opportunity**: Worldwide

**Regions of Delivery**: Canada, Ontario (except NCR), and National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contracting Entity**: Procurement Branch, Public Services and Procurement Canada
**Contact Information**: Adam Cheung, 101 Colonel By Dr., Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Telephone: (613) 945-2730, Email: [Adam.Cheung@ forces.gc.ca](mailto:Adam.Cheung@forces.gc.ca)

**Tender Description**: The Request for Proposal is for the provision of a National Institute of Occupational Health and Safety (NIOSH) certified half-mask respirator designed to provide respiratory protection due to inhalation of particulate contaminants resulting primarily from explosive gunfire residue. The resulting Standing Offer Agreement will be for three (3) years with the option to extend for two (2) additional one (1) year periods.

**Attachments**: The tender package includes several attachments, including the Operational Performance and Technical Requirements for the Lightweight Protective Respirator Mask, Statement of Work for the Lightweight Protective Respirator Mask, and Proposal Requirements and Evaluation Plan.
